name: Spaceway
description:
Spaceway is a simple 2D retro space shooter game. This game was made by me while I was in my final year of high school and I decided to upload it for whoever finds it to play.

Controls:

W: Move forward towards the mouse cursor.

D: Move away from the mouse cursor.

A: Strafe left.

D: Strafe right.

Left Mouse Button: Shoot.

Space: Boost forward.

Works much better on fullscreen in the browser.
